about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a programmer with a blend of self-taught expertise with formal education.who has been working in the front-to-back(full stack) field for more than a year and has done various projects for individuals and teams. Because I love coding and programming at leetcode, I am learning and improving my skills every day.

background.title: Background
description: I am a programmer with a blend of self-taught expertise with formal education.who has been working in the front-to-back(full stack) field for more than a year and has done various projects for individuals and teams. Because I love coding and programming, I am learning and improving my skills every day.

My goal is to continue my professional path and work in different teams and companies. I like to face new challenges and experiences to both improve my skills and learn new things. I am always looking to learn and improve and I hope to be able to play a useful and effective role in different projects.

responsibilities: Built the official site for JuniorInnovatior

items.title: Junior fullstack developer

items.description: I am currently studying at the Nizam College, Hyderabad, Telangana.

items.title: Junior Innovators Website
items.description: The official company website for JIT, showcasing services and branding (Feb 2025 - Mar 2025)
items.longDescription: Junior Innovators is a pioneering organization in Sudan dedicated to providing technological services and educatingchildren in electronics, programming, and artificial intelligence. As the Frontend Dev freelancer, I developed the responsive and user-friendly interface for Junior Innovators, a paid project. My role focused on optimizing performance, ensuring seamless navigation with responsiveness, and aligning the design with the project's educational goals.
features: modern and interactive website built using Next.js,
Smooth transitions and engaging user interactions
Works on mobile, tablet, and desktop

items.title: Noble-Rain (E-commerce)
items.description: A modern, full-stack e-commerce web app with authentication, Stripe payments, and a responsive UI. üöÄüõí (Feb 2025 - Mar 2025)
items.longDescription: As the full stack Dev, SHOPPING_CART_APP is a modern and scalable e-commerce web application built with Vite, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, Stripe, Google & GitHub Auth, Firebase, PostgreSQL, and Prisma. It provides a seamless shopping experience  for users with secure authentication, smooth UI, and integrated payment solutions.

items.title: Slot booking system
items.description: Built and integrated a Booking System into Leeza.app official website, resolving slot conflicts by ensuring no two clients book the same time and dynamically removing booked slots from the UI (Sep 2024 - Oct 2024)
items.longDescription: Built and integrated a Booking System into Leeza.app official website, resolving slot conflicts by ensuring no two clients book the same time and dynamically removing booked slots from the UI.
features: Upadated the user profile with booked slots

items.title: AI powered e-learning platform
items.description: A modern MERN-based e-learning platform with AI-powered transcription, role-based dashboards, secure authentication, and seamless media storage - (Nov 2023 - Feb 2024)
items.longDescription: E-Learning Platform is a modern and scalable online  education system built on top of the MERN stack.I worked as a backend dev in this project It provides seamless access to learning materials, video summaries using AI transcription, and a structured role-based dashboard for students and teachers. Secure authentication, payment integration, and cloud-based media storage enhance the user experience.
features: Responsive & Modern UI (Tailwind CSS + ShadCN + Flowbite Components)
